results.name: Decimal expansion of the sum of the reciprocal of the Bernoulli numbers with even index (negated).
comment: If also the reciprocal of B_{1}=-1/2 is added we have -3 instead of -1 as integer part of the constant.
results.author: _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 01 2018
